query: SELECT /* embedded single line */ 'embedded' AS second
SELECT /* both embedded and trailing single line */ 'both' AS third
/* This is an example of SQL which should not execute: * select 'multi-line'
*/ /* This block comment surrounds a query which itself has a block comment... SELECT /* embedded single line */ 'embedded' AS x2
*/ SELECT /* Deeply nested comment. This includes a single apostrophe to make sure we aren't decoding this part as a string. SELECT 'deep nest' AS n1
/* Second level of nesting... SELECT 'deeper nest' as n2
/* Third level of nesting... SELECT 'deepest nest' as n3
*/ Hoo boy. Still two deep... */ Now just one deep... */ 'deeply nested example' AS sixth
